about_us: Experience true surround sound audio with Sony’s 360 Spatial Sound Personalizer technology.1
Enjoy crystal clear sound with newly developed upward-facing X-Balanced Speaker Unit
Connect to your devices with a stable Bluetooth connection2
Enjoy personalized home theater sound for up to 12 hours on a single charge3
Campaign mode comes to life with compatibility for low latency wired single player gaming
Built in microphone & Hands free communication
Adjustable design for comfortable, long listening sessions.
Pair two BRAVIA Theater U’s at the same time with speaker add function

Sony Headphones connect
360 Spatial Sound Personalizer

What's In The Box.SUPPLIED ACCESSORIES:
Dedicated audio adaptor +
Dedicated audio cable

All features: A wearable home theater made for U

BRAVIA Theatre U is a personal speaker that immerses you in movies without disturbing others. Combine our sleek wireless neckband speaker with Dolby Atmos® and a compatible BRAVIA for immersive 360 Spatial Sound, and enjoy powerful soundtracks and crystal-clear dialogue. You can even pair with another BRAVIA Theater U to share the experience.
Uninterrupted sound. Undisturbed listening.
Our neckband speaker delivers immersive sound that surrounds your ears for open-air personal listening. Play movies at high volume without having to worry about disturbing sleeping partners or kids.
Pure comfort. Be absorbed.
Ready for hours of tireless, satisfying entertainment. Our small, light wearable speaker sits securely on your shoulders and is completely flexible so you can find just the right fit.
Ready to play or work
From low latency gaming using a wired connection to crystal clear calls on multiple devices and listening to music while washing up, BRAVIA Theatre U perfectly syncs with your lifestyle.
Planet and people

BRAVIA Theater U and its packaging have been designed to keep the environment in mind and be accessible to all. Inside the carton is a tactile dot that leads people who are blind or have low vision to a QR code2 for easy access to our web instruction manual. This guide helps users set up, understand and enjoy our technology and features.
All your favorite features in the box
Explore BRAVIA Theater U
Every word, crystal clear
Never again struggle to hear dialogue. Our X-Balanced Speaker Unit enhances movies and dramas with cinema-quality audio so every word spoken by the actors is clear and precise.
X-Balanced Speaker Unit
Optimum speaker size in a compact body. Increases sound pressure and reduces distortion for clear dialogue.
Share the excitement

Connect two BRAVIA Theater U speakers to a single TV or other devices using the Speaker Add function. Each viewer can enjoy clear, immersive surround sound with the freedom to dial in their preferred volume level, no soundbar needed.
Listen together. Simultaneous playback.

Your TV1 and BRAVIA Theater U can play sound simultaneously.2 So while your partner is watching TV, you can listen in the same high quality through your personal neckband speaker as you cook, tidy up or move around the room.
Compact. Light. Convenient.
Small and portable, our neckband speaker takes up minimal space on a table, desk or shelf when you’re not using it. Truly convenient.
Perfect with BRAVIA
360 Spatial Sound, truly cinematic

Enjoy a thrilling Dolby Atmos® experience and make movies incredibly immersive by combining BRAVIA Theater U with a compatible BRAVIA.1 Our 360 Spatial Sound creates your own spatial sound field for atmospheric listening.
Adapt to your ears
Capture your ear shape using the 360 Spatial Sound Personalizer app and enjoy a personalized sound experience.
Comfortable design
All-day comfort
Be entertained for hours in total comfort. A lightweight design ensures your neck and shoulders stay relaxed, no matter how much watching, gaming or working you’re doing.
Flexible and secure fit
Designed to be flexible, BRAVIA Theater U opens wide for a snug fit that adapts to the set of your shoulders and thickness of your neck. They'll stay in place, even when you lean back and relax.
All-day power. Quick charging.
Keep playing with up to 12 hours of power at normal volume. If you do run low, just 10 minutes of quick charging gives you an extra hour of playtime.
Fits your lifestyle
Immersive gaming with wired connection

The supplied wired audio cable connection allows you to enjoy low latency single player gaming with a wired connection. Compatiible with a variety of devices including PlayStation 5 Consoles and PC's.
Multipoint connection

Pair BRAVIA Theater U with two Bluetooth®3 devices simultaneously. When a call comes in, your speaker connects to the right one automatically. Switch between laptop videoconferencing and smartphone calls at the touch of a button.
Crystal clear calls
Every call is clear and natural. An AI-based noise reduction algorithm utilizing Precise Voice Pickup Technology delivers excellent call clarity across a variety of different environments.
Splash-proof for everyday

Listen to favorite shows and tunes while doing household chores like cooking or washing up. BRAVIA Theater U is IPX4 water resistant so you don’t need to worry about drips and splashes. Its open-air design allows you to talk naturally, whatever you're doing.
Feel the atmosphere of the arena
With 360 Reality Audio, music has never felt so real. Open a compatible music service on your smartphone and be fully immersed like you’re right there at the concert.
Planet & People
Easily accessible for all

To help make setting up BRAVIA Theater U easier for everyone including people who are blind or have low vision, we’ve included tactile dots inside the packaging surrounding a QR code1. Scan the code to go straight to the web instruction manual with screen reader support.
Environment in mind

Sony’s home audio products are designed not only for excellent sound experiences but also with the environment in mind. We are committed to using less virgin plastic in our products and packaging.Approximately 39% recycled plastics2 and recycled fabrics have been used in BRAVIA Theater U, as well as paper-based original blended material in the packaging.3
